tab.creator: Creator
bot.new-replay.msg: Enter a name for the new replay:
bot.overwrite: Are you sure you want to overwrite {}?
bot.overwrite-current: Your current replay will be overwritten. Are you sure?
bot.delete-invalid.msg: Please select a replay you would like to delete.
bot.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete {}?
bypass.allowlowvolume.desc: Allows setting the volume lower than 3%.
bypass.charfilter.desc: Allows you to bypass the character filter on any text field.
bypass.charlimit.desc: Allows you to bypass the character limit of any text field.
bypass.checkpointlimit.desc: Allows you to place more than 50 checkpoints in practice mode.
bypass.commenthistory.desc: Allows you to see any user's comment history. (Created by Uproxide)
bypass.instantcomplete.desc: Completes the level automatically when it starts.
bypass.levelkick.desc: Prevents the game from kicking you out of a level after loading.
bypass.menugameplay.desc: Allows you to control the player in the main menu.
bypass.practicemusic.desc: Unlocks the ability to use normal mode music in practice mode.
bypass.musiccustomizer.desc: Allows you to use pick custom menu and practice music.
bypass.pausebuffering.desc: Prevents the game from blocking pause buffering.
bypass.unlockicons.desc: Unlocks all icons and colors in the garage.
bypass.unlockmainlevels.desc: Unlocks all main levels in the game.
bypass.unlockshops.desc: Access all shops without having to meet the requirements.
bypass.unlockvaults.desc: Unlock all vaults and secrets in the game.
bypass.copybypass.desc: Allows you to copy any level.
creator.customobjectbypass.desc: Allows you to go beyond the 1000 object limit for custom objects.
creator.defaultsongbypass.desc: Unlocks hidden songs in the level editor
creator.editorwave.desc: Enables the wave trail in the Editor.
creator.freescroll.desc: Removes camera constraints in the level editor.
creator.hidetriggers.desc: Hides all triggers while playtesting the level in editor.
creator.hideui.desc: Hides the UI in the editor.
creator.leveledit.desc: Allows you to access the level editor from the pause menu in any level.
creator.nocopymark.desc: Removes the copy mark from your levels when uploading.
creator.resetpercentonsave.desc: Resets a level's percent to 0% when saved/unverified.
creator.sliderlimit.desc: Removes the min/max limit on sliders.
creator.smoothtrail.desc: Makes the trail in editor playback smoother.
global.audiospeed.desc: Changes the speed of the audio.
global.audiospeed.sync.desc: Sync audio speed with speedhack, if it's enabled.
global.click-between-frames.desc: Toggle the Click Between Frames mod.
global.compacteditorlevels.desc:
Enables the compact view when browsing custom editor levels.
(Adapted from code by Cvolton, created by RayDeeUx)
global.compactprofilecomments.desc:
Enables the compact view when viewing profile comments.
(Adapted from code by Cvolton, created by RayDeeUx)
global.discordrpc.time-mode.desc:
Defines how the time is displayed in the RPC.
Disabled: Time is not displayed.
Total playtime: Displays total time you've been in the game.
Level playtime: Only displays the time you've been in the current level.
Total+Level playtime: Displays total time in menus and level time in levels.
global.lockcursor.desc: Locks the cursor to the window when playing.
global.pitchshift.desc: Changes the pitch of the audio.
global.autosafemode.desc: Automatically enables safe mode if cheats are enabled
global.safemode.desc: Prevents the game from saving any level progress.
global.speedhack.desc: Changes the speed of the game.
global.tpsbypass.desc: Changes the game's tickrate. Can cause unexpected behavior.
global.transitionspeed.desc: Changes the speed of transitions between menus.
interface.font-not-found:
This language pack requires an additional font to be installed.
Would you like to download it?
interface.font-download-fail: Failed to download font. Error code: {}
keybinds.in-game-only.desc: Makes keybinds only usable while in a level.
keybinds.hint: Right-Click on any button or toggle to bind it to a key!
keybinds.press-key: Press any key to change the keybind...
labels.visible.desc: Toggles the visibility of the labels.
labels.cheat-indicator.visible.desc: Shows a red indicator if you have any cheats enabled.
labels.cheat-indicator.endscreen.desc: Shows the cheat indicator on the level end screen.
labels.cheat-indicator.only-cheating.des: Hides the cheat indicator if you're not cheating.
labels.cheat-indicator.scale.desc: Changes the size of the cheat indicator.
labels.cheat-indicator.opacity.desc: Changes the opacity of the cheat indicator.
labels.cheat-indicator.alignment.desc: Changes the alignment of the cheat indicator.
labels.show-in-editor.desc: Whether to render labels in preview mode.
labels.name: Name
labels.events.delay.desc: The delay before the event is triggered.
labels.events.duration.desc: How long the event lasts after condition is no longer met.
labels.events.easing.desc: Transition time between entering and leaving the event.
labels.delete-prompt.msg: Are you sure you want to delete this label?
level.accuratepercentage.desc: Allows for more decimals in a level percentage, and adds other useful utilities.
level.alwaysshowcoins.desc: Always shows the uncollected variant of the coins.
level.autoldm.desc: Automatically enables LDM upon entering a level.
level.autopickupcoins.desc: Automatically picks up all coins in a level.
level.autopracticemode.desc: Automatically enables practice mode when entering a level. (Created by Uproxide)
level.autosongdownload.desc: Auto-download song and SFX files when viewing an online level. (Created by Uproxide)
level.forceplatformer.desc: Forces platformer mode when playing a level.
level.freeze_attempts.desc: Freezes the number of attempts in a level.
level.hidelevelcomplete.desc: Hides the explosion, fireworks, and particles seen when completing a level. (Created by RayDeeUx)
level.hidepause.desc: Hides the pause menu. Useful for taking screenshots of levels.
level.hitbox_multiplier.desc: Modifies the scale of hitboxes in the game.
level.legacyreversephysics.desc: Forces old upside down physics among other old physics changes.
level.matchlabelfonts.desc: Matches the level percentage/level time UI element's font with the font used in a level. (Created by RayDeeUx)
level.mutelevelsfx.desc: Disables SFX/Edit SFX triggers. (Created by RayDeeUx)
level.noglow.desc: Disables all glow coming from objects.
level.noparticles.desc: Hides portal, coin, custom, etc particles in levels.
level.noparticles.nomiscparticles.desc: Includes portal, dash orb, coin, end wall particles, etc...
level.noparticles.nocustomparticles.desc: Includes particles created by the level author.
level.noportallightning.desc: Disables lightning effects when passing through size change portals and more.
level.noshader.desc: Disables all shaders in the game.
level.pausecount.desc: Shows a countdown when unpausing the game.
level.pauseduringcomplete.desc: Allows you to pause during the level complete cutscene.
level.platgamemodes.desc: Unlocks Wave and Swing in platformer mode.
level.practicecoins.desc: Allows you to collect coins in practice mode.
bot.practicefix.desc: Properly saves and restores the player's data when respawning from a checkpoint.
level.randomseed.desc: Sets a seed of choice for all random triggers.
level.showhitboxes.desc: Shows hitboxes for all objects in the level.
level.smartstartpos.desc:
Makes the start positions automatically pick the correct gamemode and speed.
(This only works in levels without directional changes.)
level.startpos_switcher.desc: Allows you to switch between start positions in the level.
level.startpos_switcher.label: Show Label
label.startpos_switcher.buttons.desc: Toggles between showing and hiding the arrow buttons in the StartPos Switcher UI
level.stoptrigondeath.desc:
Stops all triggers from continuing when you die.
(Warning: May break some levels that rely on death trigger)
level.zeropercentpractice.desc: Treats completions from 0% in Practice Mode as Normal Mode completions
player.autoclick.desc: Clicks periodically when playing levels. Applies to both the level editor and actual levels.
player.autokill.desc: Kills the player at a certain time or percentage.
player.autokill.percentage.desc: Kills the player at a certain percentage.
player.autokill.time.desc: Kills the player at a certain time.
player.clicktp.desc: Teleport player to the mouse cursor's position when right clicking.
player.customwavetrail.desc: Customize the wave trail color and size
player.framestepper.desc: Allows you to step through the game frame by frame.
player.jumphack.desc: Allows the player to infinitely jump in the air.
player.mutelevelaudioondeath.desc: Mutes all level audio (Music + SFX) on player death. (Created by RayDeeUx)
player.muterewardssfx.desc: Disables all rewards SFX (orbs, diamonds, keys) when the player dies. (Created by RayDeeUx)
player.noplatformersquish.desc:
Disables the squishing animation when jumping in place inside platformer levels.
Applies to both the level editor and actual levels. (Created by RayDeeUx)
player.norespawnflash.desc: Removes the blinking effect on respawn.
player.norobotfire.desc: Disables the robot's fire when jumping.
player.showtrajectory.desc: Shows where the player will be if they click/don't click.
player.solidwavetrail.desc: Makes the player wave trail a solid color
shortcuts.uncomplete-level.title: Uncomplete Level?
shortcuts.uncomplete-level.msg:
Are you sure you want to uncomplete "{}"?
You can't undo this process.
shortcuts.uncomplete-level.error: You have to open the level first!
shortcuts.toggle-practice.desc: Switch between practice and normal mode.
shortcuts.place-checkpoint.desc: Place a checkpoint in practice mode.
shortcuts.inject-dll.desc: Pick a DLL file to inject.
